name: C_SINGLE_ATTRIBUTE
documentation: Concrete model of constraint on a single-valued attribute node. The meaning of the inherited children attribute is that they are alternatives.

alternatives.name: alternatives
alternatives.documentation: List of alternative constraints for the single child of this attribute within the data.

invariants.Members_valid: alternatives /= Void and then alternatives.for_all(co: C_OBJECT | co.occurrences.upper <= 1)
